modName: The Bane of Death - Glowing Weapon
summary: A glowing weapon with a fairly high damage output.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod so please comment on what changes i should make.

The Bane of Death is a weapon i have made which has a base damage of 80. It requires a daedra heart, 2 ebony bars, a ebony sword and a leather strip to create.

I left it unenchanted so you could enchant with whatever you like

Installation:
Extract the file to your desired location and move its contents to the Skyrim/Data file.
author: TehRsBash
